item.description:
Lets go see the show "Stomp" together at the PPAC!!

There’s a temptation to think of “Stomp” as loud and chaotic.

To be fair, there is some noise. In the course of the 90-minute show, the eight performers make music with dustpans, rusty metal signs, ladders, folding chairs, boxes of kitchen matches, paper bags, garbage cans, oil drums and yes, even a quartet of kitchen sinks.

Sounds pretty crazy and interesting, huh?

There is a show on Saturday, Febr. 21st at 5 p.m., which I personally would prefer. Afterwards we could go out for a dinner and few drinks.

Another possibility is to go to a show on Sunday, Febr. 22nd either at 1 p.m. or 6:30 p.m. Let me know if this would work better for you!

Tickets range from $ 28 to $ 50. I would opt for the least expensive ones, but let me know your thoughts on that too.

Tickets probably run out fast, so it would be great if you could rsvp by January 14th, if you are interested or not!

Thanks and have a great week!

- Hanna
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in front of the theatre waving a German Flag!
item.name: Lets hear some noise!!!!!!!
